snippet: Errant munitions from Syria’s conflict have landed in the Golan Heights some 30 times. But the concern runs deeper along what was one border Israel didn’t have to worry much about.
abstract: Israel steps-up its military presence across the 43-mile border with Syria; increase demonstrates the growing fear and anxiety among Israeli leaders over the Syrian civil war. Obama administration reports that Israel bombed a target in Syria in response to errant strikes that have occurred inside Israel originating in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Errant munitions from Syria’s conflict have landed in the Golan Heights some 30 times. But the concern runs deeper along what was one border Israel didn’t have to worry much about.

headline.seo: Syria’s Unrest Puts Israelis on Alert
headline.main: Israel Tightens Border Defense as Syria Erupts
headline.print_headline: Israel Tightens Border Defense As Syria Erupts

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
